content: afterthought heel socks by laura linneman materials needed skein of fingering weight sock yarn that has at least 380 yards sample shown is twisted fiber arts in arial base and has a gauge of around 7 stitches to the inch size dpns or prefered needles to knit in the round that are appropriate for the yarn i used a size 1 2 25 with the arial tapestry needle 1 foot of waste yarn fingering weight yarn that is smooth and a contrast color for a video tutorial on afterthought heels go to www theknitgirllls com/wordpress/ index php/tutorials/ the cuff using the long-tail cast on method or stretchy method of your choice cast on 56 64 stitches divide evenly among 4 needles and join in the round be careful not to twist work in 2x2 rib k2 p2 for 2 inches the leg work in stockinette stitch for 4 more inches your whole piece should now measure a total of 6 inches heel placement knit 28 32 stitches using the waste yarn knit the remaining 28 32 stitches using the sock yarn knit the stitches that were worked with the waste yarn again the foot knit all stitches until the foot measures 4 inches from the desired length the toe will account for 1 5 inches and the heel 2 5 inches if you want your heel or toe longer or shorter than those measurements you can adjust the foot accordingly copyright laura linneman www theknitgirllls com llinnema@gmail com toe round one needle 1 and 3 k1 ssk k all remaining stitches needle 2 and 4 knit until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 round two knit all stitches work these 2 rounds until 6 stitches remain on each needle-24 total stitches make sure you try your socks on at this point combine stitches on needles 1 & 2 onto a single needle combine stitches on needles 3 & 4 onto a single needle using a tapestry needle kitchener the toe and weave in all ends make another sock the heels using a needle pick up the right leg of 14 16 stitches along the bottom of the waste yarn using another dpn pick up an additional 14 16 stitches from the bottom half of the waste yarn flip the sock so that the top of the waste yarn is facing you and repeat the process again you should now have 56 64 stitches on your needles using your spare double point remove the waste yarn begin to work in the round knit 1 round when you get to the gap between the top half and bottom half pick up 2 additional stitch on each side after completing the round you should now have a total of 60 68 stitches knit 3 rounds of stockinette stitch if you would like to add or decrease depth to you heel knit more/less rounds of stockinette stitch during this section begin to shape the heel as follows round one needle 1 and 3 k1 ssk
